channel.title: Don't be dumb!
channel.description:
This is a rant..... I know not much of a rant. ;)
You guys are just morons, all you need to do is register your account with an Email. Simple, easy, plus you get more bank space. This is probably the easiest way to get your account back if someone has hacked you! So just do it!!!

item.title: Don't be dumb!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

“DON’T BE DUMB!!!”

“wut iz dumb”

It is obviously reaaally hard for people to NOT be dumb.

Read full topic

item.title: Don't be dumb!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:2, topic:381819”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=477627.msg3494811#msg3494811 date=1297221987]
This is a rant… I know not much of a rant.

You guys are just morons, all you need to do is register your account with an Email. Simple, easy, plus you get more bank space. This is probably the easiest way to get your account back if someone has hacked you! So just do it!!!
[/quote]
This is funny, cause… I’m lazy.
Couldn’t someone just change the E-Mail if they hacked you?[/quote]

It takes 14 days to delete a set Email.

Read full topic
